backend/main.mo: Defines language-learning data types and seeds initial languages and conversation scenarios for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of many frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting first‑time users to set a display name and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/languages/Langua: Displays a language icon image with fallback to a globe icon on load failure.
frontend/src/components/learning/Learnin: Modal component that displays and manages interaction with a learning node, handling steps, completion, XP rewards, and progress updates.
Renders the vertical learning path layout and unit headers, delegating individual node rendering and click handling.
frontend/src/components/learning/learnin: Defines the PathNode model and builds the learning path by interleaving culture and conversation nodes, grouping into units, and marking next-up/locked states.
frontend/src/components/learning/Learnin: Displays a single learning path node with status indicators, XP info, and an interactive button styled by type and progress state.
frontend/src/components/minigames/Listen: Implements a timed listening comprehension minigame that selects questions by difficulty, tracks score and progress, and saves results on completion.
frontend/src/components/minigames/Repeat: Implements a timed multiple-choice challenge that scales with user level, tracks score, and persists results when finished.
frontend/src/components/minigames/Senten: Implements a timed sentence-building minigame where users assemble shuffled words, track score, and complete via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/minigames/Vocabu: Provides a timed multiple‑choice vocabulary quiz that scores answers, cycles through questions, and submits results.
frontend/src/components/minigames/WordMa: Creates a timed word‑matching game pairing words with translations, tracking matches, score, and completion.
frontend/src/components/nuru/AppLayout.t: Defines the main app layout with header, nav, footer, and routed content, including user login and XP display.
frontend/src/components/nuru/SectionCard: Renders a stylized section card with icon, counts, and navigation button for different learning sections.
frontend/src/components/progression/Leve: Shows a toast notification when the user levels up.
frontend/src/components/progression/XpPr: Displays the user’s level and XP progress using backend progress queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as languages, scenarios, culture entries, user progress, and profile updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Renders conversation practice scenarios with step navigation, completion handling, XP rewards, and login checks.
frontend/src/pages/CulturePage.tsx: Displays cultural learning entries with filtering, completion logic, XP rewards, and simple ID hashing.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the main user dashboard with progress stats, language selection, and navigation to learning sections.
frontend/src/pages/LanguageSelectPage.ts: Page that lists available languages, shows loading skeletons, and lets authenticated users select and save their preferred language.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Builds and displays a personalized learning path using culture entries and scenarios, with a modal for viewing individual nodes.
frontend/src/pages/ListeningPage.tsx: Provides listening practice with predefined word lists per language and uses browser TTS to play audio for each item.
frontend/src/pages/MinigamesPage.tsx: Fetches minigame configs, shows selectable minigame cards, and renders the chosen interactive game based on user level.
frontend/src/utils/difficulty.ts: Calculates difficulty settings and labels based on user level and provides scaling presets for different game modes.
frontend/src/utils/learningContent.ts: Helpers for extracting display text, translations, previews, and dialogue fields from culture content with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/tts.ts: Utility for selecting language-appropriate speech synthesis voices and speaking text via the browser TTS API.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/src/utils/xpModel.ts: Implements XP progression calculations, including level thresholds, progress percentage, XP-to-level conversion, and formatting.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, existing features, pending requests, and image requirements for the Nuru project.
